channel.title: Games & Projects on NODRAGEM GAMES
channel.description: Recent content in Games & Projects on NODRAGEM GAMES

item.title: The Prabbits: Happy Dogfights!
item.description: A multiplayer 2D dogfight game to play with friends (2-4 players) on a couch or online.

item.title: Bubble Troop
item.description: A 6-days multiplayer prototype based on Adrien Lebouc’s ideas and made with Phaser.io. All assets made from scratch.

item.title: Cannon Shooter
item.description: A 6-days prototype made with Phaser.io. All assets made from scratch.

item.title: It's a Match!
item.description: Find your true love in this game made for Games Wales South’s GameJam 2017. Made with Unity.

item.title: Catch The Crown!
item.description: A mutiplayer arena game featuring Prabbits. All assets made from scratch.

item.title: Dynamic Neural Field toolset
item.description: Small Python Library to quickly run and test 1D Neural Fields with a population rate model. Can export video.

item.title: Brain Visual Space toolset
item.description: Toolset to estimate how the visual environment is transformed in the brain. Especially in the Superior Colliculus.

item.title: Eye tracking toolset
item.description: Toolset to extract and analyse eye movements from eye tracking recording.

item.title: John Space
item.description: John Space is a space traveller seeking adventures and galactic beers. Platformer prototype made with LibGDX. All assets made from scratch.
